summary: Provides a tokenizer tailored for wav2vec2 models that operate on phoneme sequences for CTC training and inference. It loads a vocabulary, manages special tokens (bos, eos, unk, pad), optionally phonemizes raw text using a configurable language and backend, and offers encoding, decoding, and batch processing utilities.
business_intent: Enable seamless preparation and conversion of textual data into phoneme token IDs for speech recognition systems using wav2vec2 CTC architectures, supporting languageâ€‘specific phonemization and standard token handling.
